# Dedication Music Awards

| country        =
| network        =
| year           = 2005
| website        =
|most_awards=Tùng Dương
}}
Dedication Music Awards () is an annual music award presented by '', a prestigious entertainment newspaper in Viet Nam, to recognize the discoveries and creations contributed to the richness and development of Viet Nam pop music. The award is considered as a "Grammy Award" in Vietnamese music. The first ceremony was held in 2005, with the original name "Pre-Dedicated Music Award".
